author: {'steamid': '76561198238254952', 'num_games_owned': 910, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 432, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1700512293}
review:
Bazı oyunlar vardır sizi geçmişe götürür ve neden oyun oynamaya başladığınızı ve aslında oyun nediri hatırlatır, evet günümüzde oyunların çoğu deneyimleme oyunu oldu ayrıca zıpla vur eğlen kafa dağıt mücadele etten çok büyük hikayeler eserleri oldular. İşte Eldricth Hunter bunlardan değil, basit eğlencesi, basit mücadeleleri, basit derinliği ve hikayesiyle sadece OYNA diyerekten yapılmış hoş grafikli bir oyun

2.70 tl aldım şuan ne fiyattadır bilmiyorum ama oynanır 7/10

Joshua Missile sanırım oyun yapmayı bırakmış halde twitter'a uzun zamandır bir şey atmamış kendisinin oyun çıkarmaya devam etmesini isterdim, ayrıca yapımcının biraz daha derinlikli Amber Throne adlı RPG oyunu da var henüz oynamadım ama göz attığımda hoş gelmişti.

author: {'steamid': '76561198182731018', 'num_games_owned': 409, 'num_reviews': 263, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1658264065}
review:
I don't know if I should be reviewing a game as I haven't even defeated the first boss fight, but I'm gonna anyway. 

Eldritch Hunter is one of those challenging niche games with we play as a girl saving her city from a swarm of monstrosities, all with unique attacks that can one-kill you even when they died, so this game is all about planning out strategy and dodging projectile to survive to kill the cultist summoner. The main game is simple and quite easy enough, but when it comes to the boss fight, or at least the first one for me, that's another story I and 90% of players would tell later. 

Overall, I love the gorgeous hand-brushed art style with a planned-out colour palette with the enemies being purplish and the instrumental soundtracks I can't help humming to. I would be updating this review once I found the time to invest a month or even a year into this game because I know it would take a while for me to complete, but so far I'm not regretting my purchase of this unique game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198041223855', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 403, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1647701390}
review:
[h1] Resumo [/h1]
- Eldritch Hunter é um jogo divertido que trás alguns desafios é tem uma arte bem bonita, Porém sua gameplay não é tão precisa o que vai fazer você re-jogar alguns mapas varias vezes, Por isso é bom espera uma promoção.

[h1] Positivo [/h1]

- Arte
- Desafios
- Variação de armas 
- Fácil de entender 
- Curto ( dura tempo o bastante para não ficar estressante )
- Diferença entres os personagens ( caso você queira re-jogar com novos desafios provido das skills dos outros personagens )

[h1] Negativo [/h1]

- Hitbox de alguns ataques é maior do que você ver
- O mapeamento dos comandos do jogo é ruim, PORÉM da para você trocar ele
- As vezes parece que o comando de pulo não responde muito bem.

[h1] Problemas [/h1]

- Eu não tive nem um problema enquanto eu jogava.

author: {'steamid': '76561198418792950', 'num_games_owned': 112, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 245, 'last_played': 1641669655}
review:
귀여운 엘드리치 사냥꾼이 문어때를 쏴죽이는 게임
짧은 맵에서 최대한 빠르게 정해진 타겟 하나를 죽이면 걸린 시간에 따라 등급을 받는 간단한 게임이다.

스토리는 주인공이 갑자기 튀어나온 엘드리치 무리를 쓸어버린다는 별로 특별할거 없는 내용이지만 중간에 나오는 컷신들이 매우 귀여우니 컷신들을 감상하면 된다.

맵 구성도 다양했고 맵 분량도 생각보다 많았다 거기다 무기8종에 각자의 개성이 확실한 플레이어블 캐릭터 3개로 의외로 상당한 퀄리티를 보여주었다. 적들이 많이 나오지만 정해진 적 하나만 죽이면 되는 시스템이라 온갖 꼼수 플레이가 가능하다. 각도를 봐두었다가 화면밖의 적을 쏴죽인다던지 얇은 벽 넘어에 있는 적을 바주카로 범위딜로 죽인다던지 당하는 입장에서 "게임 ㅈ같이 하네"소리가 나올것같은 꼼수를 발견하는 것도 이 게임의 재미. 물론 모든 맵이 꼼수가 통하지는 않는다 실력으로 깨야하는 맵은 순수한 실력으로 깨야한다.  추가로 그 정해진 적 한정으로 해드샷이 가능해서 적진사이를 굴러서 들어간뒤 그 적을 헤드샷으로 날리는 짓이 가능해서 엄청난손맛을 느낄 수 있다.

유일한 단점이라면 조작감이 조금 애매하다. 하다가 못해먹겠네 하고 때려칠정도는 아니지만 죽으면 자꾸 조작감 핑계를 대고싶은 정도의 불편함이다,  예를 들면 예비입력이 없어 바닥에 완전히 착지한뒤 점프를 눌러야 점프가 입력된다거나 벽에 붙으면 반대쪽키를 누른다고 바로 떨어지는게 아니라 0.6초가량 동안 눌러야지 벽에서 떨어진다거나 등

아예 클리어를 목표로 본다면 무난하게 엔딩까지 볼 수 있정도의 난이도고 올A를 노린다면 정신력과 시간을 어느정도 갈아넣어야 한다. 침착하게 맵을 넓게 보고 가능한 야비한 짓을 전부 생각해보면서 최단거리를 계산하면서 될때까지 시간을 갈아넣으면 못할 짓도 아니니 이런 게임에 자신있다 하면 올A 츄라이 츄라이

5500원 치고는 매우 만족스러운 퀄리티였다 최단루트를 짜고 꼼수로 날로먹고 0.2초차이로 B받고 숱한 삽질끝에 A받고 짜증나서 
 중간에 때려치고 싶기도 했지만 게임의 모든 순간을 즐겁게 플레이했다 스피드러너들이 왜 스피드런을 하는지 알것같다 

플레이타임 첫엔딩은 2.8시간에 봤고 도전과제 올클은 4.1시간이 걸렸다.
정신나간 4-7(hive의 7번째맵) A작만 40분동안 한거같다 플렛폼 끝마다 까시를 박아놓는다는 생각은 누구 머리에서 나온건지

그나저나 이 게임 1스테이지 깨는 도과 달성률이 10퍼센트 남짓이다. 이 사람들 게임 사놓고 방치해두고 있어....

author: {'steamid': '76561198105785707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 332, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1601575479}
review:
[h1]What a loss![/h1]

I've never seen such a floaty and slow moving platforming game before. It's literally unplayable on my laptop (intel gfx) and there's nothing on-screen that justifies it. The framerate is so low that you can hear enemies die a good second before it happens on screen. Apparently the devs have been using RPGMaker or sthg similar and it shows. A f**ing farce.
There is an option for lower graphics in the menu, but it does nothing. In fact all the options go back to the default settings as soon as I leave the options menu and nothing is saved.

It was not even obvious that there was a config menu and good luck finding what to click on the world map to progress too.

The game would have been great with a good engine. I love the  theme, the graphic style and the one-screen arcade-style gameplay reminiscent of old classics such as snow bros. 
Unfortunately there is also a problem with the gameplay that ramps up so fast that you'll probably quit as soon as you reach the second world area. But most player will probably not reach it. I don't have anything against difficulty, but this is too much.

Oh, and yeah, meme speak doesn't bring anything good to your game. It detracts from it.

[h1](follow my curator page [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33882793/]GenXPlayers[/url] for more retro and indie reviews)[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198131516091', 'num_games_owned': 2712, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1597285478}
review:
"XXXXXXX, XXXX! XXXXXXX! XXXXXXXX!!!"

한밤중에 시작해, 가족이 모두 잠든 새벽녁에 클리어하고 말았습니다. 탁월한 선택이었죠.

왜냐면, 새벽녁에 분노의 중얼거림을 들은 사람이 아무도 없을 테니까요. 

이만 각설하고... 

(도전과제를 신경쓰지 않는다면) 4-8, 5-7과 5-8 스테이지를 제외하면 가볍게 클리어할 수 있는 산뜻한 게임입니다. 의외로 인게임 일러스트도 귀엽고, 괜찮습니다.  


하지만, 이 게임의 도전과제는...... 스피드런에 기반하며... 기본적으로 민첩한 반사신경과 상당한(다행히 엄청난 건 아니고요) 손가락놀림, 그리고 버블볼(3번 무기)의 반사각도에 달려 있었습니다... 도전과제를 해야 한다면, 게임 클리어하는 시간보다 도전과제 때문에 재도전한 시간이 배 이상 듭죠. 

그러니, 도전과제 헌터가 아닌 여러분은... 즐겁게 편안하게 그냥 엔딩만 보시기 바랍니다... 다행히 스테이지 4, 5의 보스만 제외하면 간단하거든요.


제 도과 달성율은 21/23. 트라이얼 앤 에러를 좀 더 하면 가능할 거 같긴 한데... 이 정도로 만족하렵니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008574085', 'num_games_owned': 2503, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 344, 'last_played': 1600636110}

author: {'steamid': '76561197987116285', 'num_games_owned': 1869, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 179, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1577187692}
review:
Un jeu particulièrement difficile qui donne du fil à retordre !
Quand on voit dans les stats de succès que seuls 10% des joueurs ont fini le 1er monde, personnellement j'en déduis que la difficulté est tellement au rendez-vous et que ça doit bien saouler les gens qui finissent par laisser tomber...

Personnellement, j'aime bien l'ambiance chelou et l'aspect un peu creepy des ennemis (renforcé je trouve par leur graphisme choupi, lol), ça donne un peu un ton décalé, et la musique est tellement sympa :)
Du coup, j'y suis régulièrement revenu, malgré quelques rage-quits ^^', pour finalement le finir, ouf!
 
Le gameplay en lui-même n'est pas forcément simple à prendre en main, entre viser et esquiver les ennemis et les tirs, ça devient vite du haut-vol, d'autant que les armes ne sont pas forcément super efficaces...

Par conséquent, c'est un jeu difficile que seuls les hardcore-gamers essaieront de terminer à 100%

author: {'steamid': '76561198057211996', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 180, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1574506200}
review:
本作は、異端審問官の[strike]顔のゆるい[/strike]女の子を操作して
クトゥルフ生物と戦うアクションゲームです。

基本的なゲームシステムは複数の武器を使い分けて敵を倒し
ステージ奥にいる狂信者を倒すことでステージクリアとなります。

ゲームは全６ワールドで構成され、それぞれにボス戦があり
歯ごたえのある戦闘が待っています。

倒すとステージ上に影響を及ぼす敵もいるためタイムアタックを
意識するなら、どのタイミングで倒すか攻略ルートを考えながら
進めていく面白さもあります。




[b]なお、このゲームには[/b]
[h1]ストアページのタイトル横にいる凛々しい女性は登場しません。[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198030550391', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 253, 'last_played': 1546544015}
review:
Весёлый платформер с пострелушками, в котором вам предстоит проходить уровни за максимально короткое время. Чем лучше результат, тем быстрее откроется новое оружие. Враги на локациях разнообразны, к каждому из них нужно найти индивидуальный подход, иногда целесообразнее пробежать мимо, чем вступать в бой. Но будьте уверены, что однажды каждый враг встретится вам в самом неподходящем месте.

Карты здесь построены интересным образом: если переть напролом, то редко удаётся пройти на ранг А, но если проявить чудеса [strike]хитрожопости[/strike] изобретательности, то можно найти более короткий путь или удобную позицию для стрельбы в глав. гада. После полного прохождения откроются ещё два персонажа с уникальными механиками, которые позволят с лёгкостью поставить новые рекорды на некоторых локациях.

Отдельного внимания заслуживает музыка, на протяжении каждого уровня вас будут сопровождать весёлые средневековые мотивы, напоминающие старые фэнтезийные мультики и комедийные фильмы про Робин Гуда.

Но больше всего в этой игре мне понравилась моська главного героя. В роликах он забавно хмурится, либо летит в неизвестность и офигивает от происходящего. Теперь у меня есть много новых скриншотов на случай важных переговоров (¬‿¬ )

Из минусов: не сохраняются некоторые настройки, а также нельзя сменить разрешение экрана. Если у вас слабая видеокарта, то на некоторых уровнях фпс может внезапно проседать с 60 до 10.

author: {'steamid': '76561198052532888', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1546273765}

author: {'steamid': '76561198045594109', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1521608752}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025059781', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1551315034}
review:
Fun little game, it presents you with some core mechanics and as you continue it comes with more challenge as you master the controls.

The game works in a level room system where you must clear each one of them as fast as you can, best times unlock weapons which can change the way you play and your tactics to clear each room faster, some of the guns are simply better than others, however, and there is a couple that you will probably never use except in very specific situations, there is a lot of variety which is pretty neat and appreciated. You can also unlock 2 new characters with different special skills besides the weapons.

The art is charming and neat, works very well with the gameplay.

Excellent background music, there is only a couple tracks but they go really well with the game and doesn't feel too repetitive.

Overall a fun experience and if it was polished a little more it could be even better, very much worth the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056173050', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 22, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1519034999}
review:
难度很高，操作也很讲究左右手配合，手残就不要玩了。反正我过了几关，心态就崩了。
另外，这操作手感真是够了。
已卸载。

author: {'steamid': '76561198163756141', 'num_games_owned': 111, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1515243199}

author: {'steamid': '76561198177866575', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 304, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1519887721}
review:
画风清新，偶尔带点猎奇，飙血特效什么的真的合适嘛（明知故问）？难度有点反人类。
操作有些别扭，如果设置里能调整鼠标灵敏度的话就好了（有钱买游戏，没钱买好鼠标）。
右键翻滚可以躲避攻击，不过对手残用处不大（泪）。
期待我通关的那天（翻白眼）。

author: {'steamid': '76561198047097123', 'num_games_owned': 2562, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 387, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 387, 'last_played': 1513844042}

author: {'steamid': '76561198321111777', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 233, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1511190633}
review:
[spoiler]我带着十分沮丧的心情撰写这份评测，因为我在二十分钟前还在努力突破我那最后剩下的三个SpeedRun成绩（2-6、6-2、1-7）但是我没能做到[/spoiler]
[h1]7/10 可以一试的游戏[/h1]
十分可口的小游戏，画风很可爱[strike]（明明是救世天父的主题XDDDD）[/strike]
小王子Christie收到了自己老爹的求救信，踏上拯救[spoiler]可怜的[/spoiler]教皇国的旅途。路上他将和一大群酸夜怪物、触手怪、邪眼、[strike]菊花怪[/strike]、[strike]名字叫Dragon的超大号螃蟹[/strike]、[strike]头上被打洞的老爹[/strike]、[spoiler]特别记仇还长触手的[/spoiler]大怪物心脏：还会遇见[spoiler]使用云朵（史莱姆？）墙和自带上升气流的[/spoiler]小巫女Belle和[spoiler]整天拖着舌头含着毒液挥舞着匕首的[/spoiler]小怪物Jackie，使用各种[spoiler]强无敌的[/spoiler]武器和这些克总的小弟战斗。
游戏很可爱，但是[b]优化一点都不可爱...[/b]不知道为什么我的爱妻1070却只能[b]三四十帧...[/b]不过习惯了手感之后倒也无所谓。
具有一定难度但也不是核心向，普通的玩家在合理使用武器的情况下也可以比较轻松的完成流程和达到一些成就...还可以挑战一下那个十分可怕的排行榜。
BGM风格很棒，吉他和笛子（？）的轻快搭配让小王子的旅途一点点呈现在我们的视野中（但是最后面的BGM真是精污啊。。）各种武器特点也鲜明[spoiler]（吐槽一下光线枪和mini gun好了...为什么会有这种武器啦喂？？）[/spoiler]
总体来说是个质量很不错的小品游戏！推荐各位打折的时候购入哦！[spoiler]喜加一[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198136950908', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 200, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 200, 'last_played': 1510724214}
review:
面白いです。主人公の赤ずきんちゃんも可愛くてグット！
箱コンでプレイできました。直感的なプレイ、短時間で終わるゲームでステージ、ボス戦一つ一つが難易度高め。初見ではですが。リスタートも早くつい何度も挑んでしまう。苦労したあとのクリアの達成感は格別。
慣れてきたらアンロックされたキャラ、武器でタイムアタックしてみましょう！二度楽しめるね！

author: {'steamid': '76561198129936651', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 477, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1505939572}
review:
Eldritch Hunter is a unique game but that does not mean it’s good. Okay, now for the story.

You play as a young girl who’s town be taken by Lovecraft monsters and you must stop them.

Now what I liked about the game.

Liked the cute art. That’s about it.

Now what, I did not like about the game.

One: A lot of the times it felt unfair, like with enemies and bosses.

Two: the story, there is barely one I mean you can make a good parody of Lovecraft stories and his monsters. But this, it feels like it just wasted a lot of time, I mean I am not asking for an epic story but what I am asking for is a little story.

So I say don’t get this game there are a lot better games, that do a good parody of Lovecraft out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019030910', 'num_games_owned': 455, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1507370390}
review:
6/10   

整體來說還算不錯的遊戲，單純通關難度普通(尾王難了一點)

對非手殘黨及不拿A評價、成就來說。

挑戰成就的話，先把人物&武器全刷出來吧

你會了解難易度的落差有多大...

這遊戲缺點:

東西(敵人&子彈過多)會很頓，不過我倒覺得還好

畢竟相當於送你的子彈時間，算是給反應較差的多點反應時間

關卡難的主要是部分討人厭的死亡殘留攻擊，與追蹤、穿牆的敵人(子彈)

當然也有些小BUG，部分武器在關卡中切換會無法攻擊

換完武器圖像沒變，但是攻擊卻換了等等

必須是進場前就先換好，或是換武器後RE才會正常。

優點:

你都買了還問我優點?

什麼!?沒買?那優點對你來說跟沒有是一樣的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198171033130', 'num_games_owned': 456, 'num_reviews': 375, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1504589665}
review:
That was probably the worst two hours of my life. I'm not even remotely joking, the amount of genuine frustration at trying to just play this piece of utter swill is unbelievable.

Explaining how unfair, obnoxious, arbitrary, unenjoyable and stupid the difficulty of this game is in depth, it's beneath contempt. Play it, you will find out. It is not worth justifying a fact. But here's a metaphor. Playing this game, is like going out to the shore with a piece of paper, standing out in the water while holding it up infront of you; and challenging yourself to hold back the morning tide using only that piece of paper. That's what it feels like to play this game, it feels like a meaningless trial that is in every way bent against you and is not actually possible theoretically. And the only reason why you're doing it, is because you paid to be here, and the only reason you succeed, is due to a fluke.

This could have been a nice, solid little indie game if the developer didn't make it painful to play. The game beside being completely based on trial and error mixed with random chance; it demands more dexterity and environmental awareness then a human can functionally give. You have two eyes, pay attention to five completely different projectile sources, get hit by one, restart.


There used to be a rant here about how toxic the developer is and how he does not deserve to be able to release creations to the public because of how straight up poisonous they are. But it's not here anymore to reduce the risk of moderation.

This is hands down, the most unenjoyable game I have ever played. It should not exist, the buffoon who made this should not be a game developer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198211285584', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1503727366}
review:
Great game but really hard. This game uses the keyboard to move and mouse to use your weapon. Because of this, you'll end up with a cramp as this game is difficult.  It starts off easy enough but it doesn't take long before it gets hard. I was nearly screaming from the difficulty of some of the puzzles as the enemies swarm you relentlessly. I swear, the puzzles were designed to give you a disadvantage as you have to get the timing of everything right. From the exact position of the enemy to the exact spot where you must fire your weapon, some puzzles require you to be in rhythm at the exact second to have a chance. It's that hard.

Yet, regardless of all that, I beat the game in 3 and a half hours. My left hand hurts like heck but I beat the game nonetheless so it's not all that bad.

I'd say it's a great game. Good graphics, nice soundtrack, decent story, easy to understand controls, you can even use a controller but I didn't had one that was compatible. If you do have a controller, I suggest you use it because your hand will hurt after dying over and over again.

author: {'steamid': '76561198135143088', 'num_games_owned': 630, 'num_reviews': 447, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1492544128}

author: {'steamid': '76561198009322999', 'num_games_owned': 630, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 547, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 527, 'last_played': 1527334898}
review:
[h1] Eldritch Hunter — это хардкорный 2D платформер. [/h1]
Ваш герой в алом плаще инквизитора должен пройти 5 зон, наполненных ужасающими тварями, будто сошедшими с иллюстраций к рассказам Говарда Филлипса Лавкрафта. А после откроется и шестая, последняя.

В каждой зоне 7 уровней, а в конце вас ждет главарь. Игра далеко не простая. Некоторые уровни проходятся за несколько секунд, другие тоже можно пройти за считанные десятки секунд, но они займут гораздо больше времени. Так как вас будут убивать. И не раз.
В конце каждого уровня инквизитора ждет тварь в желтом наряде. Наверное, это местные аватары самого главного босса. Он просто стоит и ждет, но чтобы подобраться к нему и убить, подчас инквизитору нужно исполнить несколько акробатических этюдов с большим риском для своей жизни и ваших несчастных пальцев.

При этом игра Eldritch Hunter заточена под спидраны, т.е. чем быстрее прошел уровень, тем лучше. После пробегания локации вам показывают результат. Если совсем медленно прошли, вам не начислят опыта. А если быстро, то вам покажут ранг — C, B или A, что будет совсем неплохо. И, в зависимости от ранга, вам будет начислен опыт, который отображается в виде шкалы. По заполнении шкалы полностью вам откроется новое оружие, которое, как правило, существенно облегчит дальнейшее прохождение и позволит поставить новые рекорды скорости на уже пройденных этапах.

Полный обзор здесь: http://gamin.me/posts/18321

Прохождение игры: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MtLYUyCBRaE

author: {'steamid': '76561198010662114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 230, 'last_played': 1489783507}
review: As far as $5 games go, Eldritch Hunter is everything I could ask for; a game that takes some very fundamental mechanics and executes them excellently, steadily introducing more and more challenging maps in the process that steadily test your approach to the game. It's not a game that I'd ever consider "difficult" in the way that games that you have to work at for hours to master are difficult, but its level design is constantly requiring new approaches and exploration of the tools you have. It's a few hours of solid action platforming delivered in bite-sized tactical chunks that play out perfectly for what they're meant to be. At its price point, Eldritch Hunter one of the more engaging and slickly put together games I've played in a while.

author: {'steamid': '76561198215928547', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 1002, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 790, 'last_played': 1492182344}
review:
一周目还是先通关，不要去挑战A评价，辛辛苦苦极限操作通关要10秒，换把武器直接1秒过关，所以等集齐所有武器和人物后再挑战A评价或时间，每个关卡或许都有最合适的人物和武器，而且过关中切换武器也是必不可少的，可能这是这个游戏的玩点吧
游戏的操作感我并不喜欢，轻飘飘的
还有每次打开游戏都要重新设置键位，最终boss还有bug？血条空了居然往左边负增长，后边把设置显血关了倒是顺利通关了

author: {'steamid': '76561198314884344', 'num_games_owned': 50, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 36, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1485833689}

author: {'steamid': '76561198038892067', 'num_games_owned': 3925, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 23, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 23, 'last_played': 1485628225}
review:
Sometimes i write a review to praise a game i liked very much.
Sometimes i write a review to bash a game i hated very much.
With this in mind i come to the conclusion its quite rare i write a review to help fellow gamers make a decision....which should be the main reason someone writes a review.
Then im wondering whats the point of writing a review on Steam anymore? Everybody can buy the game, try it and refund if they dont like, so whats the point of a player review? None whatsoever...but i like doing things for no reason, especially when i wake up at 3am and cant sleep anymore :P

Eldritch Hunter is a hectic puzzle action/platformer based on pattern learning with a very unforgiving difficulty curve. 
Bought the game because i liked the art style and because i like platformers, but this is not a platformer at all.
Basically all levels i played were 1-2 screens large (so nowhere to roam and nothing to explore)  and required some platforming skills, coordination, reflexes and....drums rolling....thinking....because at the heart of this game is solving difficult situations, therefore solving puzzles of different kinds, timing puzzles, control puzzles, platforming puzzles, shooting puzzles, positional puzzles...you name it.

For people looking for an action-platformer with original graphics (like this game seems to be)....look elsewhere, this is not what you get here.

This game is for people looking for a challenge, solving reflex-based puzzles in a quest for the best time.
There is very good quality stuff on offer here, its one of the best puzzle/pattern-learning/difficulty-based games ive seen.
Personally i hate this kind of games, but despite this fact, i cant help but recommend this game because there is no denying it does exceptionally well what it sets out to do, and thats a quality very few games have.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067713488', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1489851985}
review:
6ボタンマウスとキーボードを使用。
ステージに映る死体や敵モンスターはグロテスクだが
イベントシーンのイラストはほのぼのとしてかわいらしい。
会話はほとんどなく英語を読まなくても楽しめた。

何度か死んでステージを覚えながら攻略ルートを探し、
できるだけ早いクリアを目指す2Dアクションゲーム。
1ステージのクリア時間は30秒もないことが多い。
武器はクリア時の評価によってアンロックされていく。
普通に攻略していけば終盤には全て使えるようになるだろう。


操作は現状マウスとキーボードのみ。
XBOXコントローラーは使えなかった。
設定の変更はマップの歯車を押せばできる。
ウィンドウモードとフルスクリーンの切り替えはF11。

武器切り替えはキーボード上部の数字キーとマウスホイール。
キー変更はできないので6ボタンマウスなどを設定しないと
武器を切り替えながらステージを攻略するのは若干厳しい。

初期キャラ以外のキャラが使えるようになるのは終盤になる。
最速を目指さなければステージに合った武器1種と
初期キャラのローリング回避スキルで十分攻略できるが、
少々もったいない部分に感じる。


設定の変更に不便さを感じる部分はあるが、
イベントシーンのかわいいイラストに
ちょうどよい難易度のステージ、
ボス戦も楽しめる出来だった。
価格も安く、短いながらもよく纏まっているので
十分満足できたゲーム。

*ボス戦でボスの体力バーがおかしくなり
その後ボスが消えて倒せない時があった。
バグかもしれないが、各ステージのクリア評価を上げてから
もう一度挑んだら普通に倒せたので
そういう仕様だったのかもしれない。

author: {'steamid': '76561197991895839', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1486173431}
review:
A clever little action-puzzle platformer about a little girl shooting at tenacles and slimy things with dungeon punk style guns. I've been really looking forward to this one, and I was thankfully not let down.

Add this one to my cute but devious category, This game has a cute, cupcakey hand-painted character look, but has some very tricky gameplay segments that test your tactical planning as much as your reflexes.

In this game, you go room by room, level by level, clearing out enemies and making your way to shoot the evil priest, which is the target of every stage. However, this game is not a Contra-esque action shooter, but more of an action puzzle. Many enemies are traps that leave behind obstacles or fire hard to avoid missiles when killed, and if you go in guns blazing you can end up boxing yourself in. The game also makes copious use of pest-spawning flesh creatures that make being accurate and choosing good footing to advance with important to not getting bowled over by an endless steam of worms.

This is one of the areas where the game does alright. The different weapons all have their uses, while still being adaptable enough to allow the player something of a favorite playstile. For example, the basic crossbow has enough damage and fire rate to swiftly mow down a swarm of pests, but it is a bit more deliberate against larger enemies or spawner nests. A shotgun blast can scatter groups of small creatures and punish big ones, but it's not the best for driving off an advancing swarm with its slow rate of fire. The fire bow can lock down a spawner or enemy bottleneck, wreathing anything that comes at you in flames, but it is less effective for attacking or hitting moving targets.

It's all pretty cleverly done, and the game never runs out of tricks. There are only about ten unique enemies or so, but it's paced out that even in the later stages you'll encounter new threats and still see previous enemies being used in sinister new ways, as well as getting new weapons and finding new ways to purge.

I don't entirely agree with the scoring system though; especially for a game as short as this. You are rated on time and time only, so the faster you stake the priest, the more medals and weapons you unlock, which can make getting better times on harder levels easier. I feel like the game shines most when you are playing to completion though, taking on each enemy as it's own obstacle and enjoying the challenge of clearing the board as opposed to rushing.

The game is short, but sweet. It can be cleared in under two hours if you are quick. Still, it's got pretty solid core design and I don't think I was cheated for only four dollars.

Overall: It's a nice little adventure with a cute protagonist and some fairly serious challenges. Recommended for classic hardcore arcade fans. If you find yourself longing for some challenging 2D action or are a fan of the old lovecraftian setting, this one is a nice little nut for you to crack.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032539577', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1508426408}
review:
Eldritch Hunter is a seakily addictive platformer.
It manages to be difficult, without being cheap.
Every time I died I felt like it was my fault and not not because of the game.
That being said, there are some pretty difficult spots that will take MULTIPLE attempts to get through.
Despite being difficult, it takes the Super Meat Boy approach of throwing you right back in the action. Which negates any frustration coming from dying over and over again.

Music is very engaging and fits the setting well.

Highly recommended for the price.
